text: Kostas Bakoyannis (born 16 March 1978) is a Greek politician who was the mayor of Athens from 2019 to 2023. He was also governor of Central Greece from 2014 to 2019. He was mayor of the town of Karpenisi from 2011 to 2014. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Athens
title: Kostas Bakoyannis
